code: class ButtonsAnimations{async buttonHover(colour1,_ref,colour2,_ref2){let{buttonBG,animateButtonBG}=_ref;let{buttonText,animateButtonText}=_ref2;await animateButtonBG(buttonBG.current,{backgroundColor:colour1});await animateButtonText(buttonText.current,{color:colour2});}async showErrorHint(scale,_ref3){let{errorScope,animateError}=_ref3;await animateError(errorScope.current,{scale:scale});}}const buttonsAnimations=new ButtonsAnimations();export default buttonsAnimations;
